title: Video: Hooded Fang – Brahma
content:
Back in early August I had the pleasure of stumbling across the Toronto-based sixtet Hooded Fang’s sophomore record, Tosta Mista. It was its blend of woozy lovesickRock n’ Roll and good old-fashioned song writing that drew me in so unfathomably at the time. I had moved up north for a few months and frankly, I needed something emotive and fun to get me through.

Thankfully those times are over, I move back into my place in London on Monday, yet the music still moves me. It’s just so fucking pure. The video that dropped for the band’s latest single, Brahma, is equally so. Made by fine artist Jake Pauls, it follows a bird in flight. It’s simply drawn and composed; yet it manages to invoke the complex feelings of freedom in the most inspiring of ways.

Stream the video below.

HOODED FANG – BRAHMA from DAPS RECORDS on Vimeo.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
